hotels.title: India: Bengaluru Urban Escape with Onsite Restaurant, Terrace Bar, Spa & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Step into Bengaluru's most dynamic district with a stay at Grand Mercure Gopalan Mall, a sleek urban sanctuary in India's buzzing tech capital. Watch culinary magic unfold at La Utsav's interactive kitchens serving global cuisine, then your only other decision is whether to do lengths in the pool or sink into a state of bliss at the spa. When the sun sets, head to 1026 AD outdoor bar for cocktails or mocktails under moonlit skies. Located in Gopalan Mall nearby the serene Ulsoor Lake, you're in the best spot to explore Bangalore's diversity. Discover the majestic Bangalore Palace, sprawling Lalbagh Botanical Garden and verdant Cubbon Park.
